ygData.subject: Re: Ore in Oggok/Grobb
ygData.msgSnippet: some, yes, but not all the supplies you need :(  which kinda blows because I ve built my DE warriors archery up to 140, and I have a shaped oakwood single cam
ygData.messageBody:
some, yes, but not all the supplies you need :( which kinda blows because I've built my DE warriors archery up to 140, and I have a shaped oakwood single cam bow, and its kinda stupid to be using such a nice bow with such high archery skill and still be using the standard arrows. So despite my strong disbelief in "mule" characters, I've had to create me a wood elf archer....oh well, such is life in THEIR world :)

>>> "Nathaniel Niles" <nniles@...> 6.3.99 7:24:16 PM >>>
From: "Nathaniel Niles" <nniles@...>

You can buy some, not sure if all, fletching supplies in Oggok at the
Citadel of Praak.
